name: Grand Rifleman from Groove Street
description:
Carl nicknamed Grand Rifleman got heap of trouble. He took credit for millions of dollars from boss of mafia, and now all the gangsters from San Andreas (SA), California, want to give him problems. Carl took the pistol, the bat and the rifle and went outside. So hold on !!!

This app includes:
- Beautiful California Groove street style landscape
- Thief auto on streets
- Banks and offices robbery
- Race in city and out
- Fights with fists
- Many blows
- Interesting music
- Fun animations
- Interesting car theft
- Shooter game
- Strategy game
- Elements of puzzle game
- Secret missions with cheat code


Download Grand Rifleman from the Groove Street for free
